alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 9:36AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Door County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 935 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain and flooding in Sturgeon Bay due to thunderstorms. This will cause additional minor flooding. Up to three inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sturgeon Bay, Whitefish Bay, Brussels, Forestville, Clay Banks, Valmy, Rosiere, Shoemaker Point, Carlsville and Namur.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
